Metadata.title: AL expres
Metadata.description: We offer transport all over Europe

TruckHeroBanner.title: Transport all over Europe - Affordable and Reliable

frigo.title: Frigo Semi-trailers
frigo.paragraph1: WE OFFER FRIGO SEMI-TRAILERS WITH TEMPERATURE CONTROL (IN THE RANGE -30°C TO +30°C) for the transport of any temperature-sensitive goods.
frigo.paragraph2: Guarantee Freshness Across Europe: Our temperature-controlled frigo semi-trailers keep your goods at optimal conditions throughout their journey. Equipped with pallet baskets for easy loading and unloading, we ensure seamless transport with complete temperature monitoring via our vehicle thermographs.

type.label: Type
type.value: Frigo, temperature control (in the range -30°C to +30°C)

HighwayHeroBanner.title: <accent>Your good</accent> will be safely delivered almost everywhere*
HighwayHeroBanner.footnote: *countries all over the Europe and Switzerland
